metadata.title: Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) | Singular
metadata.description: Accurately measure and analyze the impact of your marketing on the user journey and conversions with the next-gen MMP

reasoning: The website content explicitly promotes Singular as an end-to-end growth platform and a Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP). It focuses on the features and benefits of Singular's own product, includes calls to action like 'Book a demo', and mentions 'About Us' implicitly through company-specific branding and language. There is no indication of comparing or listing multiple third-party products.
